thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Dehong Automotive Electronic & Electrical obtains high-tech enterprise recognition and to enjoy tax preference

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Dehong Automotive Electronic & Electrical obtains high-tech enterprise recognition and to enjoy tax preference

organizations.name: zhejiang dehong automotive electronic & electrical co ltd

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Zhejiang Dehong Automotive Electronic & Electrical Co Ltd :
* Says it was recognized as high-tech enterprise and to enjoy a tax preference of 15 percent for three years from 2017 to 2019
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/ETNvzU
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
